title: AI algorithm
extract: Artificial Intelligence: How Algorithms Make Systems Smart. ... That's really all that algorithms are mathematical instructions. Wikipedia states that an algorithm “is a step-by-step procedure for calculations. Algorithms are used for calculation, data processing, and automated reasoning.”
extract_html: Artificial Intelligence: How Algorithms Make Systems Smart. ... That's really all that algorithms are mathematical instructions. Wikipedia states that an algorithm “is a step-by-step procedure for calculations. Algorithms are used for calculation, data processing, and automated reasoning.”
